author: Peter Van Buren
title: Rich and Healthy vs. Poor and Dead in NYC
description: Economic disparity has been killing many New Yorkers all along---the coronavirus just brings it all into horrifying perspective. The post Rich and Healthy vs. Poor and Dead in NYC appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Economic disparity has been killing many New Yorkers all along---the coronavirus just brings it all into horrifying perspective.The talk in New York is about when to return to normal. But that misses the point; normal never really left, it just changed clothe… [+8819 chars]
